text: "Autumnsong" is a 2007 song by Welsh rock band Manic Street Preachers and is the third single from their eighth studio album Send Away the Tigers. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom and did not chart anywhere else around the world. ==Track listing== ===2 Track CD single=== #"Autumnsong" - 3:40 #"Red Sleeping Beauty" (McCarthy cover) - 3:14 ===Maxi CD single=== #"Autumnsong" - 3:40 #"The Long Goodbye" - 2.46 (featuring lead vocals by Nicky Wire) #"Morning Comrades" - 3:12 #"1404" - 2.27 ===Promo CD=== #"Autumnsong" - 3:44 #"Autumnsong" (Instrumental) - 3:42 ===7" limited edition=== #"Autumnsong" - 3:40 #"The Vorticists" - 3:18 (instrumental) ===Digital download=== #"Autumnsong" - 3:40 #"La Tristesse Durera (Scream to a Sigh)" - Live - 3:54 #"Autumnsong" (Acoustic version) - 3:43 #"Autumnsong" (Live) - 3:42 #"Autumnsong" (Video) - 3:38 ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Manic Street Preachers songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Autumnsong
